name: SNIT
description:
SNIT

SNIT is a first person shooter that is a mixture of arcade and a roguelite.

When playing the game you will earn points when killing enemies and at the end of a match Credits will be awarded to the player based on how many points they earned. These points can be spent in the shop to buy new weapons

On top of points enemies have a chance to drop scrap metal that can be picked up. Scrap metal can be used in the workshop to craft new weapons that might not be in the shop.

Weapons bought and crafted will save between sessions too!

Let me know what you think and if you have any suggestions just leave a comment!
